reviewText: R is a very common open source statistical computing language for doing statistical analysis. With thousands of public packages in CRAN, it's extensible for many data science tasks.This book covers the use of R for data mining and analysis, and is a great text to learn to use this free software for things like business intelligence.It covers the basic applications and packages quite well and might serve well for people coming over from larger commercial applications.
title: Data Mining and Business Analytics with R
